channel.title: Some Shop Questions [PI]
channel.description:
Hey, So I need help with stuff with shops in my server. The first problem is when you click value in some shops it says it currently costs 0 points, When it should say this currently costs amount GP.
Also next thing its not a problem but if anyone knows how to do this tell me, Ok the first shop is what my shop looks like and the second is another server's and I wan't mine to be like that bigger, with more space.
And also how do I make that unlimited sign come up with unlimited items?
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/oj02rk.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/30133mr.png[/img]
Please help, Thanks Mr Rushed

item.title: Some Shop Questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

I just found how to make prices set to infinity, this should work, idk were to put this put here is a snippet for doubles and ints

		[code]blah = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;

blah = Integer.MAX_VALUE;[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Some Shop Questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

tyb97:

You are getting that 0 because you have not set the prices for the products yet.

Oh, Ty I will try to put prices and will see if it fixes that, And does anyone know how to make unlimited sign with unlimited items and the shops to look like the ones in picture 2? And tyb it never worked the prices for it are already set…

Read full topic

item.title: Some Shop Questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Nerdaz Nerdaz
item.description:
@Nerdaz wrote:

I don’t know the complete fix for the “costs 0 points” but I know something that might help. Go to the shophandler.java and search for the items id’s, chances are they are in there. If you take them out it should fix that problem.
I’m a beginner coder so i don’t know if this will help since I don’t know exactly what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Some Shop Questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

[quote=“Needi, post:2, topic:425301”]for the unlimited sign maybe put a 0 instead of the 100 value and for the it saying it cost 0 gp go to prices.txt and put your item id and amount of gp u want it as, might already be in there as 0 so check that.

14484 20000

Red = item id
Green = Item value in GP[/quote]

Im pretty sure you read wrong, I said it says it costs 0 “Points” not GP if it was GP that will be an easy fix I know that already… Also the 0 makes the sign but you can’t buy it…

Read full topic

item.title: Some Shop Questions [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Needi Needi
item.description:
@Needi wrote:

for the unlimited sign maybe put a 0 instead of the 100? idk bout that value.

As for the it saying it cost 0 gp go to prices.txt and put your item id and amount of gp u want it as, might already be in there as 0 so check that.

14484 20000

Red = item id
Green = Item value in GP
